title: In-House Catering
description: Latin-inspired wedding and event menus crafted by our Westminster kitchen. Bronze, Silver, and Gold packages feature fresh, seasonal ingredients with authentic flavors that keep guests talking.

title: Full Bar Service
description: Curated craft cocktails, premium beer, and wine selection. Our professional bartending team creates signature drinks and handles all beverage service for your Westminster event.

title: Private Venue Buyout
description: Exclusive access to our entire Spanish-inspired space in Westminster. Perfect for weddings, corporate events, and celebrations requiring complete privacy and personalized service.
